entry.title: Zytec - Germ Buster Gel Hand Sanitizer Pro 70% Alcohol - 100 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Zytec
Type: Disposables
Price: 3.49

Product Description

This sanitizer by Zytec comes in a convenient 100 ml bottle. It’s 70% alcohol gel formula is strong enough to kill germs and bacteria. It’s aloe and Vitamin E enriched formula makes it safe and soft for use on hands.

Features

  • 100 ml  bottle
  • Contains 70% alcohol
  • Kills harmful germs and bacteria
  • Enriched with aloe, vitamin E and additional moisturizers
  • Safe to use on hands
  • Dries quickly
  • Does not require wiping or rinsing
  • Leaves no residue behind
  • Ideal for home, office, and gyms
  • Made in Canada

entry.title: Zytec - Germ Buster Extra Strength Sanitizer Spray 80% Alcohol - 500 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Zytec
Type: Disposables

Product Description

This extra strength sanitizer by Zytec comes in a convenient 500 ml aerosol spray bottle. Its extra strength formula is strong enough to kill germs and bacteria on surfaces, and safe to use on hands. With 80% alcohol content, and fast action drying, this formula will help protect you and your family.

Features

  • 500 ml bottle
  • Contains 80% alcohol
  • Kills harmful germs and bacteria
  • Safe to spray on hands
  • Dries quickly
  • Does not require wiping or rinsing
  • Leaves no residue behind
  • Ideal for home, office, and gyms
  • Made in Canada

entry.title: Zytec - All Purpose Disinfectant Spray Refill Lemon Scent - 3.78 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Zytec
Type: Disposables
Price: 26.99

Product Description

Product Details

Zytec Germ Buster All-Purpose Disinfectant Pump Spray Refill kills harmful bacteria and may be used at home or at offices, schools, health care facilities, hospitals and other commercial and institutional settings.

  • Disinfectant Pump Spray Refill which may be applied on hard, nonporous, environment and inanimate object surfaces
  • Main Ingredient: 4.5 % Citric Acid
  • Inactive Ingredients: Aqua, Laureth-7, Parfum, Sodium Citrate
  • 3.78 L / 1 Gallon
  • Refill Jug
  • Made in Canada

entry.title: Purest - Moisturizing Liquid Hand Soap With Almonds - 500 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Purest
Type: Disposables
Price: 2.79


Enjoy the feeling of clean hands without drying out your skin when you use this hand soap.

This economical soap is perfect for hotel, restaurant, or theater restrooms thanks to its large size and deep cleaning qualities. Formulated with special emollients, this soap is gentle on hands and tough on dirt and germs to help keep your guests' and staff's hands clean and healthy. Its gentle formula won't dry out hands like many other hand soaps.

Deep Cleaning

Made with foam builders and stabilizers, grease cutting agents, and pH neutralizers, this hand soap is sure to get the job done. Plus, it is versatile enough that is works well with both hot or cold water so you can use it in various locations!

Instructions Included

Safety and use instructions are located directly on the label to clearly inform the user of proper handling techniques, a definite benefit in a work environment!

Easy-to-Carry

In addition, the bulk container is easy to carry with a convenient handle and tight-sealing twist cap to reduce leakage. Perfect for filling up soap containers!

entry.title: Zytec - Germ Buster Disinfectant Wipes Lemon Scented - 800/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Zytec
Type: Disposables
Price: 46.99

Zytec - Germ Buster Disinfectant Wipes Lemon Scented - 800/Pack

DETAILS

  • Kills 99.9% of viruses and bacteria
  • For use at home or at offices, schools, health care facilities, hospitals and other commercial and institutional settings
  • Pop-up container for easy dispensing
  • Lemon scented
  • May be used to clean or decontaminate critical or semi-critical medical devices prior to sterilization or high-level disinfection

    • Each wipe is 17 cm x 20 cm

entry.title: Kosmo Kleen - Auto Dish Sanitizer - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kosmo Kleen
Type: Disposables
Price: 6.99

Keep dishes sparkling clean and sanitized with this dish washing machine sanitizer.

Great for kitchens in restaurants, hotels, and hospitals, this sanitizer is intended for low temperature dish washing machines. Convenient and easy-to-use, this sanitizer takes the hassle and guesswork out of sanitizing your dishes. Connect the container to your unit and move on to other tasks as your dish washing machine takes care of the rest.

Bulk Container

This sanitizer comes in a bulk gallon container to keep your facility in good supply as you wash your dishes.

Convenient Handle

Great for transporting this sanitizer around the kitchen, this handle provides a secure grip as you move it out of storage to connect it to your machine.

entry.title: Diversey Glance - Powerized Glass & Surface Cleaner Concentrated - 1.4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Diversey
Type: Disposables
Price: 37.99

Glance® is the market leading brand in the janitorial and housekeeping market. Trusted for decades and admired for it's quick drying and streak free shine. Our chemists Powerized the formula with ammonia and additives to outperform other glass cleaners on the market. Leaves a brilliant shine on glass, mirrors, sinks, countertops, stainless steel and many other washable surfaces. Glance® Powerized® Concentrate can easily be diluted for economical glass and surface cleaning. Ocean Blue in color with a fresh ammonia scent.

  • Formulated with Ammonia and powerful surfactants to deliver professional cleaning results
  • Wipes clean and dries fast for a streak-free shine
  • Powerized formula cuts through even the toughest grease and grime
  • Removes fingerprints, smoke film and haze leaving a crystal clean shine
  • Dual purpose cleaning ability, clean glass and other surfaces throughout any facility
  • Concentrated at 1 oz. to 16 oz. of water (1:16) to offer superior performance at an economical price
  • CBD540502
